IRS990.MissionDesc: CHATHAM HALL PREPARES GIRLS FOR COLLEGE AND FOR PRODUCTIVE LIVES. OUR RIGOROUS EDUCATIONAL PROGRAM ENCOURAGES INTELLECTUAL GROWTH, CREATIVITY, AND PERSONAL RESPONSIBILITY. WE FOSTER THE INTELLECT AND CHARACTER OF EACH STUDENT AND, THROUGH OUR HONOR CODE, LIVE IN A COMMUNITY OF TRUST. GROUNDED IN ITS EPISCOPAL HERITAGE, THE SCHOOL WELCOMES STUDENTS OF ALL FAITHS AND BACKGROUNDS.
IRS990.Desc: BOARDING SCHOOL OF APPROX 129 STUDENTS, GRADES 9-12 FULL CURRICULUM OF PREP SUBJECTS SUPPORTING ACTIVITIES, ATHLETICS, CHAPEL AND RIDING SCHOLARSHIPS AWARDED THROUGH TUITION DEDUCTION.

GrantsOtherAsstToIndivInUSGrp.NonCashAssistanceDesc: FINANCIAL AID BASED ON NEED & MERIT

IssuerName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: INDUSTRIAL DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY OF DANVILLE VIRGINIA

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: NEW MEMBERS OF THE BOARD ARE VOTED ON BY CURRENT MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES REVIEW AND COMMENT ON THE FORM 990 BEFORE A FINAL VERSION IS FILED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES REVIEWS THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND ALL MEMBERS ARE REQUIRED TO SIGN THE POLICY EACH FALL AT THE REGULAR BOARD MEETING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SALARY OF THE RECTOR IS REVIEWED BY THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ACCOUNTING PERSONNEL REVIEW THE 990 FOR ACCURACY AND THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES ARE GIVEN A COPY OF THE 990 FOR THEIR REVIEW AND APPROVAL BEFORE THE 990 IS FILED.
